details.name: The Cursed Keep of Eldoria
details.details: Eldrin discovered the Ruined Library within the keep, a crumbling repository filled with ancient tomes that contain dark necromancy secrets. Some volumes are bound in bones of long-dead scholars, hinting at forbidden knowledge and the lingering influence of the fallen kingdom.

events.description: New Quest: The Lost Tome of Eldoria

metadata.title: The Lost Tome of Eldoria
metadata.description: Deep within the ruins of the Cursed Keep, you discover a hidden chamber containing ancient tomes that may hold the key to restoring balance in the fallen realm. Retrieve these forbidden texts and decipher their secrets.

objectives.description: Locate the hidden chamber within the keep.
Retrieve at least three ancient tomes from the chamber.
Decipher one of the tomes using your Arcana skill.
